step_data.thought:
I'm now on the order details page for order #000000002. Looking at the accessibility tree, I can see this is exactly what I was asked to navigate to. The page URL confirms I'm at the order view page: 'http://127.0.0.1:7780/admin/sales/order/view/order_id/2/'.

The page displays comprehensive information about this order including:
- Order # 000000002
- Order date: Apr 24, 2022, 4:36:28 PM
- Order status: Closed
- Customer: Veronica Costello
- Billing and shipping addresses
- Payment method: Check / Money order
- Shipping method: Flat Rate - Fixed
- Items ordered: Minerva LumaTech™ V-Tee
- Order totals including subtotal, shipping, tax, and grand total

Since the goal was to navigate to view details of a specific order from the Last Orders list, and I'm now on the order details page, I've successfully completed the task. I should inform the user that I've reached the order details page.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully navigated to the order details page for order #000000002. The page displays all information related to this order including customer details, billing/shipping addresses, payment method, ordered items, and order totals.')
